an4.105:1.3: Āmaṃ pakkavaṇṇi, pakkaṃ āmavaṇṇi, āmaṃ āmavaṇṇi, pakkaṃ pakkavaṇṇi—
an4.105:1.5: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro ambūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.105:1.7: Āmo pakkavaṇṇī, pakko āmavaṇṇī, āmo āmavaṇṇī, pakko pakkavaṇṇī.
an4.105:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo āmo hoti pakkavaṇṇī?
an4.105:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.105:2.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an4.105:2.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo āmo hoti pakkavaṇṇī.
an4.105:2.5: Seyyathāpi taṃ, bhikkhave, ambaṃ āmaṃ pakkavaṇṇi;
an4.105:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti āmavaṇṇī?
an4.105:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.105:3.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
an4.105:3.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti āmavaṇṇī.
an4.105:3.5: Seyyathāpi taṃ, bhikkhave, ambaṃ pakkaṃ āmavaṇṇi;
an4.105:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo āmo hoti āmavaṇṇī?
an4.105:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.105:4.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an4.105:4.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo āmo hoti āmavaṇṇī.
an4.105:4.5: Seyyathāpi taṃ, bhikkhave, ambaṃ āmaṃ āmavaṇṇi;
an4.105:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti pakkavaṇṇī?
an4.105:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.105:5.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
an4.105:5.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti pakkavaṇṇī.
an4.105:5.5: Seyyathāpi taṃ, bhikkhave, ambaṃ pakkaṃ pakkavaṇṇi;
an4.105:5.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro ambūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
